masterGrammar.rule: rule {VP option 7a - V initial, ditransitive with DP (accusative object), DO,IO order} VP = V DP_1 DP_2 <VP head> = <V head> <V head object> = <DP_1> <V head indirectobject> = <DP_2> <V head type ditransitive> = + <V head type transitive> = + <V head type copular> = - <DP_1 head case> = accusative <DP_1 head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP_1 head type prefix poss> = - <DP_2 head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP_2 head type prefix poss> = - <DP_1 head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP_1 head type suffix copular> = - <DP_2 head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP_2 head type suffix copular> = - <VP head infl valence> = {active causative applicative} <VP head type motion> = - <V head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <VP head type comma> <= <DP_2 head type comma> <VP head type suffix> <= <DP_2 head type suffix> <DP_2 head> == ~[case:nominative] <VP option> = 7a

rule {VP option 7aNegObjVerbRequired - V initial, ditransitive with DP (accusative object), DO,IO order} VP = V DP_1 DP_2 <VP head> = <V head> <V head object> = <DP_1> <V head indirectobject> = <DP_2> <V head type ditransitive> = + <V head type transitive> = + <V head type copular> = - <DP_1 head case> = accusative <DP_1 head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP_1 head type prefix poss> = - <DP_2 head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP_2 head type prefix poss> = - <DP_1 head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP_1 head type suffix copular> = - <DP_2 head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP_2 head type suffix copular> = - <VP head infl valence> = {active causative applicative} <VP head type motion> = - <V head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <VP head type comma> <= <DP_2 head type comma> <VP head type suffix> <= <DP_2 head type suffix> <DP_2 head> == ~[case:nominative] <VP head> == [object:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if object negative, VP must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <VP head> == [indirectobject:[head:[infl:[polarity:negative]]]] -> | if indirectobject negative, VP must be [infl:[polarity:negative]] <VP head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <VP option> = 7aNegObjVerbRequired

rule {VP option 7aIO - V initial, ditransitive with DP (accusative object), IO,DO order} VP = V DP_1 DP_2 <VP head> = <V head> <V head object> = <DP_2> <V head indirectobject> = <DP_1> <V head type ditransitive> = + <V head type transitive> = + <V head type copular> = - <DP_2 head case> = accusative <DP_1 head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP_1 head type prefix poss> = - <DP_2 head type suffix poss> = - | only in possessor position <DP_2 head type prefix poss> = - <DP_1 head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP_1 head type suffix copular> = - <DP_2 head type prefix copular> = - | only in no V/Aux copulars <DP_2 head type suffix copular> = - <VP head infl valence> = {active causative applicative} <VP head type motion> = - <V head type comma> = - <DP_1 head type comma> = - <VP head type comma> <= <DP_2 head type comma> <VP head type suffix> <= <DP_2 head type suffix> <DP_1 head> == ~[case:nominative] <VP head fronted> == ~[cat:FocusP] <VP option> = 7aIO
